name: 專項運動生理學
description: 透過綜評性文獻 (review articles) 的閱讀與討論，瞭解各運動專項的生理特質以及評估方式，進而提升運動專項知能，並提升學術研究能量。
goals: 瞭解各單項運動的運動生理學特質與訓練方法
瞭解有氧耐力訓練與無氧耐力訓練的學理基礎
培養英文文獻閱讀能力
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】

教學目標  
1\. 瞭解各單項運動的運動生理學特質與訓練方法（課堂中所討論的運動專項，將依修課同學專長與興趣而定）。  
2\. 瞭解肌肉與能量適能訓練的學理基礎。  
3\. 培養英文文獻閱讀能力。  
  
  
週次授 課 內 容  
第一週：課程介紹（討論本學期所欲探討的運動專項，上課內容與主題將依修課學生興趣而有變動。）  
第二週：Physical assessments of athletes  
第三週：Muscular fitness and training  
第四週：Overtraining and regeneration training  
第五週：The science of cycling physiology and training part 1 & 2  
第六週：A review on the mechanisms of blood-flow restriction resistance training-induced muscle hypertrophy  
第七週：Is there an economical running technique? A review of modifiable biomechanical factors affecting running economy  
第八週：Effects of taper on swim performance. Practical implications  
第九週：Increases in lower-body strength\` transfer positively to sprint performance: a systematic review with meta-analysis  
第十週：Lactate threshold concepts: how valid are they?  
第十一週：Design and interpretation of anthropometric and fitness testing of basketball players  
第十二週：Vertical jump in female and male volleyball players: a review of observational and experimental studies; Post-activation potentiation: underlying physiology and implications for motor performance  
第十三週：Strategies to improve running economy  
第十四週：Developing maximal neuromuscular power: part 2 - training considerations for improving maximal power production; Physical attributes, physiological characteristics, on-court performances and nutritional strategies of female and male basketball players  
第十五週：Methods of prescribing relative exercise intensity: physiological and practical considerations  
第十六週：Warm-up and performance in competitive swimming; Chapter 3: Sprinting  
第十七週：緩衝週  
第十八週：自主學習

methodologies.note: 以討論的方式針對特定主題進行討論。
學生選擇有興趣之主題，進行課堂報告。

grading.note: 出缺席與學習態度（缺課三次以零分計算）。
